channel.title: smart on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in smart on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-06
item.description: Amazon is reportedly working on a smart fridge (2 minute read) Project Pulse is a smart fridge being developed at Amazon that will be able to track inventory and purchase habits, predict what customers need, and have those products delivered.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-15
item.description: Hereâ€™s everything Apple announced at its iPhone 13 event (3 minute read) Apple has unveiled its latest line of hardware releases at its California Streaming event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-10
item.description: Amazon starts making its own TVs with new Fire TV Omni and 4-Series (4 minute read) Amazon has announced its Omni and 4-Series Amazon-branded 4K Fire TVs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-15
item.description: Facebook Working on Smart Watch to Compete With Apple Watch (2 minute read) Facebook is working on a smart watch that will work without a tethered smartphone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-20
item.description: Amazon focuses on another use for Alexa as Echo Frames smart glasses are now available (2 minute read) Amazon is moving its Echo Frames smart glasses from invite-only to general availability.
